Text.Page:
Ancient guardians bar the way of progress. Their task is noble but time hasn't been kind to them. They damage the very thing they were charged to protect.

If we're to understand and harness the Fountain of Shara, the {@LinkCreature:26#3001#soulkeepers} and {@LinkCreature:26#3002#hallowed sentinels} must be destroyed. This task falls to you.

Don't grieve their loss. They weren't sentient in the least, merely loyal to their orders.

Perhaps now we can understand the extraordinary properties of the fountainâ€”and perhaps turn them to our own needs.
